Articles.Content: Attaching parts to Big S wings results in the parts always being out of alignment, this is disastrous for landing gear, and wasteful for engines

Couldn't you just rotate the parts?

Rotate with angle snap on, results in further misalignment.

Rotate without angle snap on, results in having to eyeball it, predictably that never ends well

Rotate with angle snap on, results in further misalignment.

Rotate without angle snap on, results in having to eyeball it, predictably that never ends well

Toggle between local (part relative) and absolute (VAB) alignment with F, once you're in Absolute/VAB alignment mode you can hit space to reset it straight (or manually dial it back with the widgets)
